## ðŸ“Œ Key Design Motifs

| Piece | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| **Mascot Icon** | A rounded shield symbol containing a plus (+) medical mark, with abstract curved antler-shaped arcs at the top. No facial features, no character likeness. |
| **Meaning** | Protection + Helpfulness â†’ visually implies your identity is safe and cared for. |
| **Style** | Flat vector, geometric, bold outlines, no gradients in icon mark (gradients permitted in background). |

**Not allowed:** hats, faces, anime-style eyes, clothing, resemblances to Tony Tony Chopper or any other copyrighted character.

## Azure Entra ID Compliance

All assets will be generated to meet Azure Entra External ID requirements:
- **Background Image**: 1920Ã—1080 px, max 300 KB, PNG/JPG/JPEG
- **Logo**: Optimized dimensions for banner display
- **Favicon**: 32Ã—32 px, web-optimized
- **Color Accessibility**: WCAG 2.1 AA compliant contrasts

## ðŸ§Š UI Card Layout Guidelines

**Centered login card with modern spacing**

- Border stroke visible, not flat fill only
- Shadow: subtle, soft, atmosphericâ€”not harsh

**Specifications:**
```css
Border-radius: 18â€“20px
Border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.65) (light)
        1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.25) (dark)
Padding: 36â€“44px desktop / 24px mobile
```

**Content hierarchy inside card:**

```

[ App Name â€” Reader Web ]
[ Greeting â€” "Welcome back, Captain" ]

```

**Tone guidelines:** Confident, kind, adventurous.

## Azure Entra ID Compliance

All assets will be generated to meet Azure Entra External ID requirements:
- **Header image**: 245x36 px, max 10 KB, PNG (preferably)/JPG/JPEG
- **Background Color**: Hex/RGBA values
- **Background Image**: 1920Ã—1080 px, max 300 KB, PNG/JPG/JPEG
